original_text: Jehoiakim was twenty-five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned eleven years in Jerusalem. His mother's name was Zebidah the daughter of Pedaiah of Rumah.
korean_text: 여호야김이 왕이 될 때에 나이가 이십오 세라 예루살렘에서 십일 년간 다스리니라 그의 어머니의 이름은 스비다라 루마 브다야의 딸이더라

sentences.original_text: Jehoiakim was twenty-five years old when he began to reign
sentences.korean_translation: 여호야김은 왕이 되었을 때 스물다섯 살이었고

sentences.original_text: and he reigned eleven years in Jerusalem
His mother's name was Zebidah the daughter of Pedaiah of Rumah
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 어머니의 이름은 루마 사람 레다야의 딸 스비다였���니다
